Superuser command contents have not been logged for this entry. Full logging can be enabled for all apps by selecting Settings --> Logging --> Full content, or on a per-app bases by selecting the app in the apps listing.
NOTICE: This app is known to have problems with full content logging - the global log setting is ignored. Full logging can only be enabled through the per-app configuration dialog.

If cleanup succeeds, root will be lost, and this app will close automatically in a few seconds. Please reboot your device afterwards. Beware that some kernels automatically re-root at boot. Are you sure you want to continue ?

"If cleanup succeeds, this app will close automatically in a few seconds. Please reboot your device afterwards. After boot, go into the other superuser app and make it update it's binary. Are you sure you want to continue ?"

ธีม
Do not display any warnings about missing android.permission.ACCESS_SUPERUSER permissions
Display warning if android.permission.ACCESS_SUPERUSER permission not declared in manifest
Enable multi-user
Only the primary user has root access
All users have root access
รีเฟรชแทบแอ๊พและบันทึกอัตโนมัติ
All Pro features are enabled, even if you did not purchase SuperSU Pro
SuperSU จำเป็นต้องรีสตาร์ทเพื่อให้การตั้งค่ามีผล
เปิดการใช้งานเวอร์ชั่นโปร
Multi-user support is currently disabled. Only the primary user can use SuperSU. The primary user can enable multi-user support in SuperSU settings.
We need to do some clean-up and reboot before we can convert to a system app, to prevent data loss. After the device reboots (if the app just closes, reboot manually), please retry this option.
ขออภัย การติดตั้งที่ /system ล้มเหลว
ติดตั้งไว้ใน /system
Please reboot your device as soon as SuperSU closes. If it does not appear at all after boot, reinstall from Play
Even processes running as system user need confirmation to gain root
Allow processes running as system user to gain root access without confirmation
ไว้วางใจผู้ใช้ของระบบ
